Sorry we have decided to add a bit of extra content to this page.



Could we please add a 'header' section to this page (like the image attached) with the title 'Acoufelt is proudly SA Based' with this image:



https://www.dropbox.com/s/gm535lol1o5fmt8/_DSC1047.jpg?dl=0



With the text saying: 'Founded in South Australia, Acoufelt continues to maintain its global strategic developments in marketing and R&D, as well as manages customer care and operations in the APEC region, all within its Adelaide headquarters in the heart of the CBD'.




Thanks!

Marketing Manager

Warm regards,



Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

Hi Lucy, 

Please have a look at the SA landing page and let us know what you think: https://acoufelt.com/sa-based-products/

@manuel can you please do this ticket. 

  1. Duplicate this page: https://acoufelt.com/products/ and call it SA-based Products
  2. Have a look at this mockup: the attached image for the design "Product-register-example.png 966 kb" that's where the clients want's the logos to appear. 
  3. The logos are these: (NOTE: please don't upload the images, just link to them in HTML using the below 2 files):
  1. https://industryadvocate.sa.gov.au/sapr/20180202-acoufelt/SA-Product-Supply.jpg
  2. https://industryadvocate.sa.gov.au/sapr/20180202-acoufelts/SA-Product-Install.jpg

    Thanks!!

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

Could you please have a quick read of the email below.

Basically, we are needing to create a landing page for the SA Product Register, to indicate which products we can claim are “SA-based”. You can see the breakdown of logo-use in the link below – our products would all be ‘Supply’ and ‘Install’ compliant. To keep this very simple, we would like this landing page to be based around our current products page – with the logos added as per my drawings in the image attached. At this stage, we are not too fussed about having any written content around the SA origin of our products - so really, just add the logos and we should be good to go.

Once you’re finished with this, could you please flick me the link and I’ll run it by Nicole.

Thanks heaps! Just hit me up if you have any questions.


Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310
Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000
acoufelt.com <http://www.acoufelt.com/>




From: DIS:Office of the Industry Advocate <DISOfficeoftheIndustryAdvocate@sa.gov.au <mailto:DISOfficeoftheIndustryAdvocate@sa.gov.au>>
Sent: Thursday, 10 January 2019 3:02 PM
To: Lucy Pittman | Acoufelt <lucy.pittman@acoufelt.com <mailto:lucy.pittman@acoufelt.com>>
Subject: RE: SA Product Register Reminder [DLM=For-Official-Use-Only]


For Official Use Only <> <>


Hi Lucy

Thank you for your email providing your webpage. I apologise for any confusion we are looking for the URL to your landing page that utilises the logos we initially sent.

I have included below additional information, I hope that this is of assistance, there are a couple of example website links towards the bottom of this email.

The steps

Register with the SA Product Register
Make a landing page (see below)
Send us back a link to the landing page
If all is good, we activate your profile


You can read more on using the various logos at the compliance page https://industryadvocate.sa.gov.au/sa-product-register/make-your-site-compliant/ <https://industryadvocate.sa.gov.au/sa-product-register/make-your-site-compliant/>


What is a landing page?

Instead of using the front page of a website, an internet advert often leads to a landing page made for an advertising campaign. It is a separate web page that uses the campaign to talk about products and once the customer is at the website, they are easily directed to the normal product pages for more details.

For you, the campaign is the SA Product Register and we want you to use our logos to describe your products. To decide which logos to use, the Industry Advocate’s rule of thumb is where do the labour hours for that logo occur? If it is by you, in SA, then please place the logo next to the product.

For material works (i.e. sheet metal or tables), do you Manufacture, Assemble, Supply or Install the product in SA?
For service and non-material products (i.e. software or house plans), do you Create, Produce or Implement the product in SA?
Our logos quickly and easily show planners which local process applies to your product. It gives them confidence of the South Australian product and businesses they are quoting in a tender.

Most businesses are suppliers and implementers so no shame in that. If you supply a product made by someone else in SA, the landing page is the perfect place to mention it. Even link to them.



Linking instead of copying a logo

Please remember to only link to the logos and do not copy them. Then any changes we make at our end can immediately appear on your web site.

Linking means your web page uses the HTML code below to show the logo picture. Many online website programs, such as some WordPress or Wix sites, copy the pictures to their server and may not be suitable for this purpose. Please investigate your options.



Logo links

OIA Logos (Office of Industry Advocate)

http://industryadvocate.sa.gov.au/sapr/20180202-acoufelt/SA-Product-Manufacture.jpg <http://industryadvocate.sa.gov.au/sapr/20180202-acoufelt/SA-Product-Manufacture.jpg>
http://industryadvocate.sa.gov.au/sapr/20180202-acoufelt/SA-Product-Assemble.jpg <http://industryadvocate.sa.gov.au/sapr/20180202-acoufelt/SA-Product-Assemble.jpg>
http://industryadvocate.sa.gov.au/sapr/20180202-acoufelt/SA-Product-Supply.jpg <http://industryadvocate.sa.gov.au/sapr/20180202-acoufelt/SA-Product-Supply.jpg>
http://industryadvocate.sa.gov.au/sapr/20180202-acoufelts/SA-Product-Install.jpg <http://industryadvocate.sa.gov.au/sapr/20180202-acoufelts/SA-Product-Install.jpg>


Product Description Logos

https://industryadvocate.sa.gov.au/sapr/20180202-acoufelt/SA-Product-Manufacture.jpg <https://industryadvocate.sa.gov.au/sapr/20180202-acoufelt/SA-Product-Manufacture.jpg>
https://industryadvocate.sa.gov.au/sapr/20180202-acoufelt/SA-Product-Assemble.jpg <https://industryadvocate.sa.gov.au/sapr/20180202-acoufelt/SA-Product-Assemble.jpg>
https://industryadvocate.sa.gov.au/sapr/20180202-acoufelt/SA-Product-Supply.jpg <https://industryadvocate.sa.gov.au/sapr/20180202-acoufelt/SA-Product-Supply.jpg>
https://industryadvocate.sa.gov.au/sapr/20180202-acoufelt/SA-Product-Install.jpg <https://industryadvocate.sa.gov.au/sapr/20180202-acoufelt/SA-Product-Install.jpg>


Example websites

http://www.adelaidemarble.com.au/?page_id=3049 <http://www.adelaidemarble.com.au/?page_id=3049>
https://www.sonnex.com.au/projects/ <https://www.sonnex.com.au/projects/>
For the Home Battery Scheme: https://adamsolar.com.au/products/ <https://adamsolar.com.au/products/>


If you need help making your site compliant we can recommend web page designers. If you have any questions please contact us on 8226 8956 <tel:8226%208956> or reply to this email.

Kind regards

Nicole Morphett
Industry Advocate – Business Coordinator
Office of the Industry Advocate <http://www.industryadvocate.sa.gov.au/>

T 8226 8926 <tel:8226%208926>
M 0439 423 717 <tel:0439%20423%20717>
E nicole.morphett@sa.gov.au <mailto:nicole.morphett@sa.gov.au>
W https://industryadvocate.sa.gov.au/ <https://industryadvocate.sa.gov.au/>
A Level 13, 99 Gawler Place, Adelaide, 5000

<https://industryadvocate.sa.gov.au/sa-product-register/register/>

Hi Phil Grace <>
Thank you for registering Acoufelt for the SA Product Register, we cannot activate your SA Product Register profile until you provide us with a landing page URL for your website. When we have received your URL we can connect your to the Product Register and display your business in the Building and Construction section.

https://industryadvocate.sa.gov.au/sa-product-register/search-industry/#s_result <https://industryadvocate.sa.gov.au/sa-product-register/search-industry/#s_result>
Thank you for registering your business, should you have any questions or would like additional information sent, please don’t hesitate to contact our Office on 8226 8956 <tel:8226%208956> or reply to this email address.

Kind regards,


Nicole Morphett
